code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ClipboardItem=_ref=>{let{clip,onCopy,onEdit,onDelete}=_ref;const[copied,setCopied]=useState(false);const handleCopy=()=>{onCopy(clip);setCopied(true);setTimeout(()=>setCopied(false),2000);};const isImage=clip.content&&clip.content.startsWith('data:image/');const createdDate=new Date(clip.createdAt).toLocaleDateString('en-US',{month:'short',day:'numeric',year:'numeric',hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit'});const isEdited=clip.updatedAt&&clip.updatedAt!==clip.createdAt;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"clipboard-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:clip.title}),clip.category&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"category-badge",children:clip.category})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-content",children:isImage?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:clip.content,alt:clip.title})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-content",children:clip.content})}),clip.tags&&clip.tags.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item-tags",children:clip.tags.map(tag=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"tag",children:["\uD83C\uDFF7\uFE0F ",tag]},tag))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-date",children:[createdDate,isEdited&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"edited-badge",children:"(edited)"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCopy,className:"btn-copy",children:copied?'‚úì Copied!':'üìã Copy'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onEdit(clip),className:"btn-edit",children:"\u270F\uFE0F Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(clip.id),className:"btn-delete",children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Delete"})]})]})]});};export default ClipboardItem;
